Row.Text: Welcome to Oregon. I am John Whiteaker. I hope you didn't get dysentery on your trip west.
Greetings! I'm John Whiteaker, governor of Oregon. Have you seen Crater Lake?
Oregon has been defeated. I can only hope you respect the freedom of all peoples.
You again?
I've gotten your request and will file it carefully. Now, run along.
What is it now?
Great leader, what may John Whiteaker do for his friend?
I am not interested in war. Maybe you should talk to the someone else.
Greetings, how goes your struggle against the enemy?
Are you liberating or enslaving? You seem to have a significant army.
Your continuing expansion is upsetting. It will eventually cause your downfall.
We were just discussing about your continuing expansion. You should take that as a warning.
Looks like we're not the only ones spreading out. You're awefully close to our territory.
We were just discussing about your continuing expansion. We may need to deliver some freedom to your people.
We are proud to have an ally with so many soldiers.
Your empire is famous for its strong economy. Perhaps you'd like to invest in some breweries?
Cities are so mainstream, I'm glad you forgot to build them.
I think you forgot to build an army.
We will have no business with likes of you.
Sorry, no. Let me finish my decaf double latte and get back to you.
You just got put on the tyrant's list. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

I announce the world that you are a vicious tyrant. Don't tell me you didn't see this coming.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
I have always been polite, and I deserve nothing of this sort.
I am pleased to hear of your friendship with {1_CivName}, as they are great friends of mine.
Getting too close to {1_CivName} will severely damage our diplomatic relations, for you to know.
I strongly urge you to reconsider your position with {1_CivName}. They have been staunch supporters of all people.
I agree with you that {1_CivName} is not to be trusted.
We noticed your alliance with {1_CivName}, and Oregon is not afraid to follow you to this alliance.
Oh great, now the vermin are breeding. Now I have to deal with both you and {1_CivName}?
I share your convictions that {1_CivName} only causes problems for our cause. Perhaps the combination of our denouncements will have them rethink their actions.
Our best interests would be making a declaration of friendship between our two countries.
Great leader, would your nation like to make a declaration of friendship with Oregon?
Oregon will not tolerate your military build-up at its most sacred borders.
I am concerned about your growing expansion, and must warn you against it.
Your continuing expansion is endangering liberty. For you to know, it will eventually cause your downfall.
Your continuing expansion is endangering freedom. For you to know, it will eventually cause your downfall.
I am concerned about your growing expansion, and must warn you against it.
I will never forget your merciful actions towards our civilians.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations and may lead to war.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
Oregon respectfully declines to oblige your concerns.
I understand your concerns. I will see to it that this case will be settled in the Congress.
How about this? We will bring joy to our people.
As a sign of mutual respect, Oregon would be willing to open her borders if you are willing to do the same.
Would you be willing to assist us in these dark times? I would be indebted to your great nation.
There will be war, but you shall not see our nation succumbed. We will battle to the death for the cause of freedom!
Very well. Our forces will overwhlem you.
Oregon shall never surrender.
John Whiteaker does not forget betrayal. This will eventually lead to your downfall.
Oregon seeks justice, not peace.
This is quite disappointing to hear.
You have our thanks.
